data.title: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Barbenera, 2019, buy online from Weavers Independent Wine & Spirit Merchants
data.meta_description: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano Barbenera 2019 from Weavers Wines
data.text:
We pride ourselves on an efficient and friendly delivery service, either on our vans or via our delivery partners. We use minimum order values to help reduce the cost of our carbon footprint.

The quality of our packaging ensures the wine arrives safe and sound, it is full compostable or recyclable.

Your order will be packed and processed and delivered within 3 to 4 working days, subject to stock availability or any queries we may have on the order.

FREE 6 Bottle Local Delivery**: With and order of 6 assorted bottles or more delivered to your home or place of work.

Click and Collect : Click and collect is available from our shop between 9.30am and 5.00 pm Monday to Saturday and from our collection partners.

Single Bottle Delivery: We offer single bottle delivery on 75cl sizes or less for £7.50 per address to the UK mainland on a track and trace service. Allow 3 to 4 working days. Subject to postcode.

FREE Standard Delivery on orders over £145*: We offer free delivery to the UK mainland with 3 to 4 working days, subject to postcode, on all orders over £145 to an individual address which can be either your home or place of work subject to postcode. Please see the Zone Surcharge below.

Weekend, Next Day and Times Delivery: Should you require a Saturday or timed delivery please give us a call or select the delivery option on the check out screen.

Deliveries under £145: Deliveries under £145 are charged at £12.95 per address subject to postcode.

Delivery Surcharge*: We would love to be able to deliver free to all locations in the UK, unfortunately our carriers charge more for people who live in some of the most beautiful, remote areas of the UK. Please see the zone surcharge below.

*Zone Surcharge based on Postcode

Zone C £25.00 - A31 to AB38, AB40 to AB56, IV1 to IV28, IV30 to IV32, IV36, IV40, IV52 to IV54, IV63, KW1 to KW14, KA27, KA28, PA21 to PA38, PH4 to PH41, PH49, PH50, BT (Northern Ireland).

Zone D £35.00 - HS, IV41 to IV49, IV51, IV55, IV56, KA27, KA28, KW15 to KW17, PA20, PA41 to PA49, PA60 to PA78, PH42 to PH44, ZE, IM (Isle of Man)

We are unable to deliver to international addresses.
